(1) In every case where a valuation list is to be made under this Act for any area, the Chief Valuation Officer may serve a notice on the owner, lessee or occupier of any property in the area, or on any one or more of them requiring LAWS OF GUYANA Valuation for Rating Purposes Cap. 28:04 9  L.R.O. 1/2012                                               him or them to make a return containing such particulars as may be reasonably required for the purpose of enabling the Chief Valuation Officer accurately to compile the list.
